definition: employ one's talent to the fullest/everyone gives of their best
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: So that the business really the best use of them before they make the best use.
sentences.chinese: 從而使企業真正做到人盡其才，才盡其用。

sentences.english: Let every man so his best.
The theoretical research showed that letting everybody fully display his talents needs a good environment.
sentences.chinese: 理論研究表明，人盡其才需要良好的環境。

sentences.english: Let every man do his best.
